code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import emoji from"react-easy-emoji";import"./Greeting.scss";import SocialMedia from"../../components/socialMedia/SocialMedia";import Button from"../../components/button/Button";import{greeting}from"../../portfolio";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Greeting(_ref){let{prof}=_ref;const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);/* Skip rendering entirely if the portfolio flag is off */if(!greeting.displayGreeting)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"40px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greet-main",id:"greeting",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"greeting-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"greeting-text-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:`${isDark?"dark-mode":""} greeting-text`,children:[greeting.title," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"wave-emoji",children:emoji("ðŸ‘‹")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode greeting-text-p":"greeting-text-p subTitle",children:greeting.subTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialMedia,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-greeting-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"Contact me",href:"#contact"}),greeting.resumeLink?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"Download my resume",href:require("./resume.pdf"),download:"Resume.pdf",newTab:true}):null]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting-image-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-content-profile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:prof.avatarUrl,alt:prof.name,className:"profile-image"})})})]})})});}
